snippet: The mother of a young black man shot dead by the San Francisco police filed a federal civil rights lawsuit, saying officers needlessly opened fire in a shooting captured on video.
abstract: Gwendolyn Woods, mother of Mario Woods, black man fatally shot by San Francisco police, files federal civil rights lawsuit alleging officers opened fire unnecessarily.
lead_paragraph: The mother of a young black man shot dead by the San Francisco police filed a federal civil rights lawsuit, saying officers needlessly opened fire in a shooting captured on video.

headline.main: California: Civil Rights Suit Filed Over Man Shot to Death by Police
headline.print_headline: California: Civil Rights Suit Filed Over Man Shot to Death by Police
